name: Nobel Laureate Mother Teresa Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Nobel Laureate Mother Teresa Charitable Trust is a humanitarian development and social relief NGO striving for the upliftment of the poor, downtrodden and under privileged in the society irrespective of caste, creed and religion. We work on - Poverty alleviation through Government  and Non-government projects & Schemes. Rehabilitation of destitute and under privileged.  Provide health care and basic medical assistance. Provide educational assistance to the poor. Promote self employment (Free computer & tailoring  courses. Create awareness on alcoholism, human rights, drug abuse, tobacco consumption etc. Conduct various camps (Health, Eye, Dental etc). Community sensitization programs.  Seminars/Workshops on various social discriminations. Distribution of food, saris, dhotis, books, bags, tricycles for the poorBeneficiaries/No. of people Served:Women/ChildrenSchool Students/School dropoutsAged –Men & WomenHandicappedPoor – downtrodden & Neglected
